column2: If the player has a non-dynastic heir and dies or abdicates, Game Over.
If the player has a non-dynastic heir and dies or abdicates, then they will continue the game as their heir (with their heir's dynasty), avoiding Game Over. Does not apply to nomads or republics.
The Dynamic Resource System assigns each province a unique resource modifier.
Unique resource modifiers will be assigned to every province.
Unique resource modifiers will not be assigned to every province.
The Uprising system causes revolts to spawn in the Stepstones and in the lands beyond the wall when they are ruled by a foreign culture.
The MSS (Missionary System) allows for the spread of religion through missionary events.
The events pertaining to the fuction of the Night's Watch.
Great Works like the Banefort or Skyreach are enabled
Only major Great Works like Winterfell or the Eyrie are enabled.
Vassal may decide to join their lieges war or to oppose him.
Vassals can not make choices upon war.
You might end up with children without a mother on start-up.
Generates spouses for fathers whose children have no mother. The generated spouses then become the mother of his children. Affects female and male characters equally.
